Container.Name: MangaNotify
Container.Overview:
MangaNotify - Advanced manga tracking and notification system
Features: • Track manga updates from MangaBaka API • Push notifications via Pushover & Discord • Optional authentication & security • Modern responsive web interface • Real-time polling and updates • Customizable themes and layouts • Comprehensive watchlist management
Perfect for manga enthusiasts who want to stay updated on their favorite series!
